descriptionHtml:
Now you can conjure dragons with this spell. But it will attack you on being summoned.
To get the spell, go to Whiterun Dragonsreach, and search for the spell tome on Farengar\\\'s table.

The creation of this spell was not my idea. It was the idea of daventry (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/416631). So thanks to him for the brilliant idea.

If anyone wants a follower dragon rather than a hostile one, please post.
author: Debdut
